domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @senatemajldr We the people pay you $3346 per week and you are complaining that we want to pay unemployed Americans an additional $600 per week to put food on their table and pay basic living expenses. They lost their job because of your failed response to COVID19. Shut up and pay up.
